p: All data were entered into the Statistical Package for Social Sciences (SPSS version 22.0, IBM, Armonk, NY, USA) statistical analysis software. For the pre-teaching data, the chi-square test was used to analyse gender differences between the two cohorts. Students’ recent examination scores for the “Chinese Materia Medica” course, baseline test scores, and assessment scores were analysed using independent t-tests. The significance threshold was set at 0.05. The effect size was also calculated using Cohen’s d statistics.
